name: AfterQuery
headline: High-quality AI starts with high-quality human data
description:
We empower foundational AI labs, enterprises, and startups by providing high-quality human-generated datasets that are essential for fine-tuning more capable, refined, and reliable AI systems. 

Our thesis is that truly exceptional model performance requires the highest quality human training data.

To solve for this, we are building a platform to onboard experts in various fields to work on custom datasets. Think of the working professionals at top firms and the smartest students in various subjects (PhDs). Then, whenever our clients have a request for a certain type of data, we will construct and lead a team to produce: fine-tuning data, RLHF data, benchmarks, etc.

We’ve already started in finance, illustrating the importance of high-quality data in our paper posted here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2501.18062.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:b2b; industry:data-labeling; industry:big-data; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Carlos Georgescu, Co-Founder
founders.description:
Building AfterQuery. Previously interned at Citadel Securities (2x), Meta & Google as a software engineer. Past acquired ed-tech founder. 

Studied for a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of British Columbia.

founders.name: Spencer Mateega, Co-Founder
founders.description:
Building AfterQuery. Previously interned in technology private equity at Silver Lake, technology investment banking at Morgan Stanley, and software engineering at Meta and Google. Built and sold a startup with Danny, in high school.

Studied for a B.S. in Finance and Statistics at Wharton and a M.S. Computer Science at Penn.

founders.name: Danny Tang, Co-Founder
founders.description: Building AfterQuery. He was previously a student at Wharton and interned at Morgan Stanley where he worked on the largest IPO of 2024. Built and sold a startup with Spencer, in high school.

# Our Solutions
Procuring data that can't be found online or synthetically generated
### Foundational Models
Fill-in the gaps of your LLMs with unique data
#### Chain-of-Thought Insights
Reasoning frameworks from experts across finance, software engineering, and more
#### Bespoke Multimodal Datasets
High-quality datasets curated for your specific use case, from multilingual to multimedia
#### SOTA RL/HF Requests
Process supervision, human verification, weighted preference optimization, etc.
### Enterprise AI
Tailor out-of-box AI to your business needs
#### Domain-Specific Data
Data that is relevant to your business workflows, reducing hallucinations and incorrect reasoning
#### Custom Benchmarking
Custom benchmarks for your business, so you know how your AI is performing
#### Easy Integration
Supercharge your AI internally with our data, without relying on external AI providers
### AI Startups
Accelerate your AI tool development
#### Rare Datasets
Fine-tuning datasets for your AI tools that are not publicly available, tailored to your use case
#### Rapid Prototyping
Constant prototyping and iteration, finding the best data to fine-tune your models
#### Competitive Edge
Dominate your niche with AI tools that deliver the "wow" factor to your customers
## From Concept to Dataset
A systematic approach to building high-quality, custom AI training datasets
### Define & Scope
Share your AI training needs and goals. We'll work together to define the perfect dataset parameters.
### Strategic Design
Our team crafts a custom data collection framework optimized for your model's requirements.
### Expert Engagement
We activate our network of domain specialists to generate high-quality, real-world insights and examples.
### Quality Assurance
Every data point undergoes rigorous validation, cleaning, and enrichment while preserving critical context and metadata.
### Seamless Delivery
Receive your production-ready dataset, formatted to your specifications and ready to enhance your models' performance.
### Or Ask Us About the Datasets We Already Have
We maintain a collection of specialized datasets ready for immediate deployment
# What Sets Us Apart
Expertise and execution in AI training data
### Quick Iteration
We stay with our customers and continue to provide them the data they need to maximize LLM performance
### Novel Data
Our data is human generated, providing unique insights that are not available through web scraping or synthetic generation
### Quality-First
Rigorous vetting process for access to top practitioners in their respective fields, ensuring premium data quality
### Nimble and Scalable
We move fast and provide what is needed at the right quantity, adapting to your AI training requirements
Get started
### Elevate Your Models.
Get started with AfterQuery today and experience the power of human-curated, specialized datasets.
Contact Sales Book a Call

generated_description:
AfterQuery is a freshly minted startup based in San Francisco that officially launched in 2024 and is part of Y Combinator’s W25 batch. Their mission is simple yet profound: "High-quality AI starts with high-quality human data." 

What sets AfterQuery apart is their strong belief in the adage that great models start with great data. They aim to empower AI labs, enterprises, and startups by supplying meticulously crafted human-generated datasets that are crucial for enhancing and refining AI systems. AfterQuery is tapping into a potent thesis: to achieve top-tier model performance, you need top-tier training data.

The brains behind AfterQuery are not just tech enthusiasts; they are committed to building a structured platform that brings together experts from various fields—think seasoned professionals and bright PhD students. Whenever a client needs a specific type of data, AfterQuery assembles a tailored team to create bespoke datasets, focusing on areas ranging from finance to more complex domains.

Their current offerings span several categories:

1. **Foundational Models**: They provide unique datasets to fill the gaps in your large language models (LLMs).
2. **Enterprise AI**: Customized data solutions help businesses enhance their AI without the fear of generating incorrect outputs or hallucinations.
3. **AI Startups**: Startups can access rare datasets that fast-track their AI developments, giving them the competitive edge needed to impress customers.
4. **Bespoke Datasets**: Every project begins with a thorough assessment of the client’s needs, followed by strategic design and expert engagement to ensure the highest quality and relevance of data.

AfterQuery prides itself on its rigorous quality assurance process. Every data point is validated and enriched with critical context, ensuring that clients don't just receive data; they receive data that can dramatically boost their AI’s performance. 

From finance (as demonstrated in their published research) to diverse multimodal datasets, AfterQuery is on a mission to set a new standard for what AI training data can and should be. With a small but nimble team ready to adapt, AfterQuery is one to watch as they continue to redefine the landscape of AI training.

If you want to delve deeper into their offerings or even partner up, you can check out their website at [AfterQuery](https://afterquery.com).
